name: Ellipse Solutions
description:
Founded in 2006, Ellipse Solutions is a global Microsoft Dynamics AX and Dynamics 365 Partner specializing in business solutions, software development and implementation services for manufacturing, distribution, construction and professional services companies.
Our experience with ERP systems dates back to the beginning of Axapta as a product in the U.S. marketplace, and includes successful implementations and upgrades of all AX and Dynamics 365 versions, releases and hotfixes.
